ModMetaData.name: Mods Balance Patch by GoodVine
ModMetaData.author: Mr.GoodVine
ModMetaData.description:
Mods Balance and Compatibility Patch Version: 1.4.6
Mod compatibility for Hightech CyberPack. May used as standalone mod. Must be loaded after all mods.
=====
Common: - More mineable steel for modpacks - More orbital trades ships - Nerf leather human market price - Craftable reinforced barrel - Setup start count factions for tribal to zero - Disable visual effect in Archotech Structure Studiable - Wind turbine smaller size - Rottable BodyPartNatural - Craftable AI Core - Add money to traders - Add Nurse worktab - More works for BasicWorker
=====
Trading: - Tradable Psychic amplifier, Neurotrainers skill, Broadshield core, HiTechArmor - More money for traders - More orbital traders
=====
VGP: - Disable basic cook meals. Only from VGP - Fix meals ingredients - Make sushi with fish from Vanilla Fishing Expanded, Biomes! Islands, FishIndustry - Humanoid Alien Races MixingIngredients bug fix - Add garden drinks to drug policy - RawFungus Fix - ReGroth:Core Fix
=====
Eccentric Tech: - Research ship needs Aurora Core - Add Angel Apparel to traders
=====
Cybernetic Warfare and Special Weapons: - Patch craft imbalance weapons. For end game - Tradable weapons - Add weapons to another factions - Add more hediffs for use weapons, then CONN is enabled
=====
Backup Power: - Add research to Batteries
=====
SeedsPlease: - More seeds in traders caravans - Add Rice seeds to default scenarios - Add wild growthable Rice, Potato, Hay Grass to Temperate and Tropical biomes for seeds
=====
Nyaron race: - Add man gender to Nyaron - Fix correct names - Adds Nyaron to common factions with balance fix - Nyaron xenotype
=====
RimFridge: - All fridges is movable
=====
Expanded Prosthetics: - Table Prosthetics decrease requirement Plasteel for 50 - PowerArm recipe fix
=====
SRTS: - Patch SRTS for end game, then you bild the ship
=====
Vanilla Base Generation Expanded: - Add Nyaron, BlueMoonCorp, Rimsenal Federation Faction settlements
=====
Disable annoying incidents for: - Sparkling Worlds: InsectHiveDropSW - Vanilla Events Expanded: Drought, AnimalPodCrash, Earthquake, BattleAnimalsWanderIn, WildMenWanderIn - Nyaron race: Infestation - ReGrowth: DevilDusts
=====
MendAndRecycle: - Market price 4 silver for MendingKit, because in default is too much market value then sell it
